channel.title: CVE Feed for pierrelannoy -- MailArchiver
channel.description: The latest CVEs for pierrelannoy -- MailArchiver

item.title: CVE-2023-3136|2024-08-02T06:48:07.300Z -- pierrelannoy -- mailarchiver
item.description: The MailArchiver plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via an email subject in versions up to, and including, 2.10.1 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.
